name: Unstable Alchemy (Wu Jin, ObscurialZ)
description:
Unstable AlchemyUpdate  10.5: 

Add Mac version fixeds some bugs.

Background:

the Founder of  Qin Dynasty, Ying Zhen, had just completed his great cause of dominating the world and building the Great Wall, and he began to yearn for the magic of immortality. As one of First Emperor of Qin's alchemists, you found the legendary elixir of life on the Penglai fairy island recorded in the "Classic of Mountains and Seas".However, this formula is not complete. You were asked to complete this formula and refine The  Elixir. The emperor assigned you an alchemy room and assigned you some death row prisoner. It is a really hard progress, and it is very unstable, you need to make attemps to finally refine The Elixir for the Grate Qin Dynasty!

Gameplay:

Players play the role of the alchemist of Qin Dynasty in the game, simulating the complete alchemy process (burning - choosing medicine - sealing - controlling heat - getting elixir - testing elixir). Different operations in the alchemy process will lead to different results. Different elixirs may cause the explosion, death of prisoners, or have different physical and mental effects on prisoners.

Controls:

Left Mouse -  Interact with the scene

E - Pick up items

F - Open Guide Book

Esc - Pause Game & Exit
